subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The senior guard Renee Montgomery shook off a shooting slump with seven 3-pointers and 25 points Sunday to lead No. 1 Connecticut (10-0) to an 83-71 victory over Florida State in the finale of the women’s Caribbean Classic at the Moon Palace Resort in Cancún, Mexico.
snippet: The senior guard Renee Montgomery shook off a shooting slump with seven 3-pointers and 25 points Sunday to lead No. 1 Connecticut (10-0) to an 83-71 victory over Florida State in the finale of the women’s Caribbean Classic at the Moon Palace Resort...
